response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that stands above the rest. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this exceptional value. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of providing you with a product that will exceed your expectations.", "product_price": 7500}
